titles: Lux orientalis, or, An enquiry into the opinion of the Eastern sages concerning the praeexistence of souls being a key to unlock the grand mysteries of providence, in relation to mans sin and misery.
author: Glanvill, Joseph, 1636-1680.
notes: Written by Joseph Glanvill. Cf. BM, Wing.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
keywords: Providence and government of God --  Early works to 1800.
